featured.text: Surprised by the father and son’s “pale faces” and their battered vessel, the Penghu police and fishers in Paisha rescued them.

definition.zh_def: 受到重創的，受傷的，或經歷過長期虐待的。
definition.en_def: Damaged or injured by repeated blows or hard usage; also refers to someone who has been subjected to prolonged abuse.
definition.example: The battered old car struggled to start in the cold weather.
